reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, comfortable, and of nice quality, with good color and material. They appreciate its versatility, noting it can be dressed up or down, and one customer mentions it's perfect for travel. The fit receives mixed feedback, with some finding it nice while others say it runs large, and opinions about the pockets are divided between those who love them and those who dislike them. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite dress in my closet
items.body: This dress is so cute. Perfect just as is or with leggings. The material is so soft and it is so comfortable. It fits true to size. I can wear to run errands, or a sports event or dress up for a special night. The material weight is perfect for any season. It is not see through, but not too heavy either. I love it so much, I have bought in multiple colors and in short sleeve too. They don't wrinkle and I am pleased with the quality of each dress I have purchased. The black is a nice dark black, it has not faded with washing. I also love the blue, the color is vibrant, exactly as pictured, maybe prettier. I hang mine to dry, but I'm sure you could put in the dryer on low heat. They are often on sale, but I would pay full price, a great deal . I get so many compliments anytime I wear one of them. I'm sure I will be buying more. Read more
items.author: Shari Blankenship

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made, stylish and comfortable!
items.body: Amazing dress that you can dress up or down and it has POCKETS! This washes up well on gentle cycle and hang to dry. I had to use the steamer after washing the first time as creases from initial packaging didn't wash out. Second time washing I didn't need to steam. The material is better than expected. The style almost gives you an hourglass figure due to the way its sewn. I thought it would be more aline. It does run a bit large. Read more
items.author: Elizabeth Foley

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Inconsistent sizing across colors
items.body: I purchased this dress in blue and in rust. The rust color fit well and I kept it. It is very comfortable and is stylish with tights and short boots. Unfortunately I had to return the blue as it was too small and showed every lump and bump. Although a very pretty color, the blue also had a weird shadowing in the fabric at the neckline that was not present in the rust colored dress For reference I am 5'4", 127 lbs. I ordered the small in both colors. Read more
items.author: M & S Yebra

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I ordered a second dress!
items.body: Love this dress! It’s so comfortable and looks cute with my tall boots. I can dress it up with a belt and/or scarf or keep is as is. The material is a nice quality, soft and not bulky or too thin. I’m 5’4 and ordered a medium. The length comes to about knee length and I have room to move with ease in this dress. The pockets are a great bonus. I ordered this in an olive shade and recently ordered a second dress in black. Read more
items.author: Melissa Tobin

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Heavy fabric but otherwise nice quality.
items.body: Nice dress but too heavy & warm. Ordered one but reveived 2 Read more
items.author: Carole

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort at a great price!
items.body: Material is nice weight and feels great! I'm 5'4" and 160, my tummy is the problem area. I bought a large and it is a nice fit. Manages to hide the tummy without looking like a bag! I'm ordering another color. Read more
items.author: Scooter

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the perfect versatile dress to travel with.
items.body: This is a perfect travel dress in black. It does not wrinkle and can look elegant with a multi-strand crystal necklace, off-black hose and dress shoes. However, you can easily wear it as a casual dress during the day. The material is a nice, fall thickness, but is not hot at all. Read more
items.author: Charlotte W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable will order another one.
items.body: Love the dress. It was a little big in the hip area, so I ordered a medium. Read more
items.author: Tammy Anderson

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A - Black, A - Dark Green, A - Haze Blue, A - Dark Gray, A - Light Gray, A - Apricot, A - Burnt Orange, A - Coffee, A - Pink, A - Navy Blue, A - Light Khaki, A - Army Green, A - Khaki, A - Purple Red. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
